description: Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump faced off Monday night at Hofstra University in Hempstead, N.Y.
title: Photographs From the First Presidential Debate
title_page: Photographs From the First Presidential Debate - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 15,
Donald J. Trump and Hillary Clinton greeting each other on Monday at the first presidential debate, moderated by Lester Holt of NBC, in Hempstead, N.Y.
